name: Another Part of Me
wikiSummary: "Another Part of Me" is the sixth single from Michael Jackson's 1987 album Bad with the single being released in 1988. The song however was originally featured in Jackson's 1986 3-D film Captain EO.  The song can also be heard during the third level of Jackson's Sega Genesis game Michael Jackson's Moonwalker, and was performed live during Jackson's second leg of his Bad World Tour.
wikiText:
"Another Part of Me" is the sixth single from Michael Jackson's 1987 album Bad with the single being released in 1988. The song however was originally featured in Jackson's 1986 3-D film Captain EO.
 
 The song can also be heard during the third level of Jackson's Sega Genesis game Michael Jackson's Moonwalker, and was performed live during Jackson's second leg of his Bad World Tour.
